content:
Scenario: Operator exits 70-hour work weeks for sustainable life balance
    Given franchise operation demanded constant presence and crushing time commitment
    And James sacrificed family time, health, and personal life to business survival
    When conversion enables his exit or transition to reasonable steward role
    Then 70-hour weeks end, replaced by balanced schedule if staying or complete exit
    And family relationships can heal after years of absence and stress
    And personal health improves through reduced stress and reasonable hours
    And life beyond business becomes possible for first time in years
    And workplace_elohim ensures transition protects his wellbeing
